card.name: Mister Elegance
card.description: {{KW:MAGIC}}: If played on the left, gain +1/+1 and {{KW:TAUNT}}. Otherwise, gain {{KW:ARMOR}}. If you have an ally {{CARD:480|1}}, do both.
